bio: A gargantuan fish SV Snaggerjag befriended on his travels. It's strong, and takes pride in being the sailor's largest catch ever!

soultimate.name: A Fish's Life
soultimate.description: Hit foes with a giant waterfall for big damage.

skill.effect: Drops incoming damage by 20% and gives super armor.
skill.name: Tough Scales

name: Tantrump
